name: Driverpunk
description:
Welcome to the Future!

This is an arcade racer about surviving while a group of enemies follows you.

Originally a school project, now uploaded online for all to play!

If you want to play the game in the browser, go here!

Credits:

Thom

Tycho

Kevin

Luuk

Irmin

Mert

Liam

Olivier

Voice Over:

Kenneth

Sound Effects:

SFXR

Music:

Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio

Bihler

John 00 Fleming

Also, don't spam click F in the loading menu, it crashes the game. And yes, you can easily cheese the highscore.
